content: ofenhandschuh seite 1 oven mitt with thumb gusset by gitwerg for personal use only materials coats „lyric 8/8 100% cotton 50 g/70 m in white light green and dark green 1 ball of each colour hook 4 0 mm us g tapestry needle or sewing needle size hand circumference approx 19 20 cm the mitt is worked throughout in single_crochet single_crochet close rounds with a slip_stitch instructions with white chain 4 and close to ring round 1 8 single_crochet in ring round 2 increase 4 single_crochet evenly cid 1 12 stitches ofenhandschuh seite 2 round 3 increase 8 single_crochet evenly cid 1 18 stitches round 4 work 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet round 5 increase 8 single_crochet evenly cid 1 26 stitches round 6 increase 8 single_crochet evenly cid 1 34 stitches round 7 work 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet round 8 increase 4 single_crochet evenly cid 1 42 stitches continue working in rounds 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet until the mitt is 12 5 cm long break yarn thumb with white chain 4 and close to ring round 1 8 single_crochet in ring round 2 increase 4 single_crochet evenly cid 1 12 stitches round 3 increase 4 single_crochet evenly cid 1 16 stitches continue working in rounds 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet until the thumb is 5 5 cm long break yarn attach light green in first single_crochet of the mitt and work to last single_crochet of the round 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet don t close the round but continue working over the 16 stitches of the thumb now close round with slip_stitch work 2 more rounds over all 58 stitches 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet in the next round skip 1 single_crochet at both sides of the thumb at the point where thumb and mitt come together cid 1 56 stitches work one row over all 56 stitches in the next row decrease 2 stitches as before continue with decreasing 2 stitches every second round until there are 42 stitches again note after 3 5 cm of light green change to dark green continue in rounds 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet until the dark green stripe is 3 5 cm long then change to white and work another 2 5 cm 1 single_crochet in each single_crochet break yarn for the hanger attach white in a single_crochet of the last round opposite to the thumb chain 15 make a slip_stitch in the next single_crochet turn your work and work 18 single_crochet in the loop
